narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Hopebridge LLC is a Behavior Analyst provider based in Apex, NC. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $8.3M in Medicaid payments across 31K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: This provider received $8.3M in Medicaid payments. While not among the largest billers, unusual patterns in providers of this size can still indicate systemic issues worth monitoring.
